snippet: Allies of conservative former French president Nicolas Sarkozy are asking beleaguered presidential candidate Francois Fillon to find a replacement candidate, according to a Sarkozy ally present at a meeting on the issue on Monday....

headline.main: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels

lead_paragraph: Allies of conservative former French president Nicolas Sarkozy are asking beleaguered presidential candidate Francois Fillon to find a replacement candidate, according to a Sarkozy ally present at a meeting on the issue on Monday.
